Name: Alcyon Infinity
About the game: Alcyon Infinity is a fast shooter/bullet hell with dynamic movement and risk management. Play alone, or plug-in additional Controllers and play with your friends or against them. (1-4 Players) Boost and Drift your way up to the enemies' blindspot Chain kills to level up your combo and multiply your earnings Unlock and upgrade your Weapons and Shield Manage your energy use by always being one step ahead Enemies get stronger as you progress Choose when to end your run, lest the enemies choose for you!
